title: Stocks Trim Early Loss, Precious Metals Recover: Markets Wrap
description: Stocks trimmed their losses at the open and precious metals recovered from a weak start, underscoring the fragile sentiment in markets after a choppy end to the week on Wall Street.
content: Stocks trimmed their losses at the open and precious metals recovered from a weak start, underscoring the fragile sentiment in markets after a choppy end to the week on Wall Street.
